title: Spring Game Showcase 2024 - 60 New Video Games - Kinda Funny x The MIX
description:
Kinda Funny and the MIX have teamed up to bring you a jam-packed showcase of brand new video games!

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Follow Us:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids 
Instagram: http://instagram.com/KindaFunnyVids
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames

Merch: http://www.kindafunny.com/store 

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
In Review Intro Videos by: https://twitter.com/CameronKen
In Review Intro Music by: https://twitter.com/CarterHarrell

Listen To Our Podcasts On Your Favorite Podcast Service:
Kinda Funny Games Daily: https://bit.ly/2T3Y3rS
Kinda Funny Gamescast: https://bit.ly/3wBgRwg
The Kinda Funny Podcast: https://bit.ly/3wA9GVo
In Review – Movies Ranked, Reviewed, & Recapped: https://bit.ly/2VAgdT7
PS I Love You XOXO – A PlayStation Podcast: https://bit.ly/3r3rjvB
Kinda Funny Xcast – An Xbox Podcast: https://bit.ly/36twqvD
Kinda Funny Screencast – TV & Movie Reviews Podcast: https://bit.ly/3e7yQ75

Follow The Kinda Funny Team:
Greg Miller: https://twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim Gettys: https://twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick Scarpino: https://twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Andy Cortez: https://twitter.com/TheAndyCortez
Blessing Adeoye: https://twitter.com/BlessingJr
Mike Howard: https://twitter.com/SnowBikeMike
Kevin Coello: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyKevin
Joey Noelle: https://twitter.com/joeynoelle
Barrett Courtney: https://twitter.com/SadBoyBarrett
Roger Pokorny: https://twitter.com/rogformer

I'm an action adventure game fan let's take a look at a dozen awesome action adventure games headed your way soon this is Children Of The Sun a Puzzler shooter by Berlin developer Renee Rother in each mission it is your objective to kill multiple cultists with a single bullet this level is near the game's halfway point and your character has just unlocked the ability to accelerate their bullet in order to pierce body armor at the beginning of each level you will need to conduct reconnaissance inspect the territory and locate your enemies you can also Mark your targets to help you keep track of where you want your Bullet To Go valid targets can be enemies gas tanks or even birds and fish at each point of impact on a valid Target you have the opportunity to redirect your bullet killing an armored enemy requires firing from a great distance and accelerating the bullet as much as possible before it reaches its Target redirecting the bullet mid-flight is one of the first Powers unlocked

armored enemy requires firing from a great distance and accelerating the bullet as much as possible before it reaches its Target redirecting the bullet mid-flight is one of the first Powers unlocked and is a staple of gameplay shooting a car's gas cap will detonate the car killing all nearby enemies many enemies have specific regions of their body which glow hitting those regions empowers your bullet giving you access to stronger powers after completing your objective your bullets path and your score are shown seek Peak efficiency to climb to the top of the leaderboards as you exact your revenge in Children of the [Music] sun [Music] Christmas my way home I've open [Music] [Music] way [Music] [Music] know [Music] what can you tell me about the demon core there was an incident all right find that suit secure the demon core prevent a global catastrophe all mankind is counting on you no [Applause] pressure [Music] hey hun can you give me a hand in the kitchen all those men [Music] gone

[Applause] [Music] yours [Music] hello my name is Alex I'm the lead developer of Undead West Undead West is a bullet hell Rog light inspired by games like into the gungon Nuclear Throne and Hades to name a few in this top down pixel art twin stick shooter you play as a gunslinger who's been killed in a duel death himself revives you so that you may carry out your revenge on your quest of Vengeance throughout the wild west every enemy killed grants you a soul to repay your debt to death and every time you die your soul returns to the underworld where you can spend your souls to unlock more guns outfits and whiskies whiskies are an in-game item when consumed provide a buff a temporary but powerful effect like bullets that freeze enemies on hit set them on fire or spread poison damage you will encounter a wide variety of enemies standing in your way including the undead at the end of each level you will face a challenging boss fight designed to test your skills if you succeed you are

you ready to [Music] [Music] begin [Music] e [Music] [Music] n [Music] [Applause] [Music] [Music] hi I'm Alis wood and I play Alex the unlikely hero of mithre Ambrosia [Music] Island Alex is taking a much needed break from Modern Life when her vacation is cut short by a mysterious storm which shipwrecks her on a forgotten Island fortunately the island is home to a dysfunctional family of odells the long lost Greek [Music] gods the C thickens they have no recollection of who they are and they've each shut themselves away in a different part of the island so it's up to you to save the gods explore the island make new friends return their memories and solve the mystery of their lost [Music] identities we can't wait to welcome you to the shores of Ambrosia Island later this [Music] year h [Music] [Music] ow [Music] the truth the truth is an ugly mistress but I ain't no ugly [Music] duckling [Applause] [Music] w [Music] welcome to the world of songs of Silence an Epic Fantasy 4X strategy

[Music] ow [Music] the truth the truth is an ugly mistress but I ain't no ugly [Music] duckling [Applause] [Music] w [Music] welcome to the world of songs of Silence an Epic Fantasy 4X strategy game from Chimera entertainment coming to PC and consoles this year today we introduce the Aaron guard of the Thousand kingdoms one of our main playable factions led by the young Queen laurelai whilst the 1,000 kingdoms consist of many different separate Realms our story focuses on the people of one areng guard laurelai is the Scion of the ruling family of AR guard the sole survivor of her line after her family were slaughtered in a vicious assault by The Crusade religious zealots who are spreading the silence across the land fleeing the aftermath of the disastrous battle laurelai leads the tattered remnants of the areng Guard military along with a train of starving refugees searching for a new place to call home desperate laurelai Strikes Out In Search of an old family Ally the an hower hower

remnants of the areng Guard military along with a train of starving refugees searching for a new place to call home desperate laurelai Strikes Out In Search of an old family Ally the an hower hower is the right-hand man of King atran a powerful priest in his own right with Divine powers and Celestial troops at his command could he provide a new home for laurelai and the people of areng guard or has the Silence already reached his walls the 1,000 kingdoms are made up of humans known as the starborn a society with a roughly medieval level of Technology supplemented by divine power hours the starborn race was created by the celestial Gods to live in the world of light and given eyes to witness their incandescent glory having eyesight forever separates them from their firstborn forefathers a human race Without Eyes who make their home in the Dark World a religious and Marshal civilization the Aron guard survived through moral compromise and Military preparedness within a hierarchical and

human race Without Eyes who make their home in the Dark World a religious and Marshal civilization the Aron guard survived through moral compromise and Military preparedness within a hierarchical and structured Society the gods live above whilst the high Lords look down on their people from tall towers starborn abide by the laws of the cosmic Accord as well as a strict code of chivalry and virtue the armies employed by the Aron guard are formed around a core of stolid Pike infantry and the mighty iron sworn Cavalry mounted on fearsome War Bulls they are also able to call upon less mundane allies such as the celestial l Warriors and The Colossal word Brer a snake-like messenger of the celestial gods that commands the power of lightning on the battlefield will you lead the Aron guard to a new home or will your song be forever lost to the blight of Silence wishlist songs of Silence today the signal is an open world survival crafting game where you play as an Explorer in search of a new

new home or will your song be forever lost to the blight of Silence wishlist songs of Silence today the signal is an open world survival crafting game where you play as an Explorer in search of a new home for human kind your search brings you to a seemingly unpopulated Planet filled with natural beauty and curious biomes that are littered with strange alien relics as you explore the planet you chart the ecosystem and understand its inner workings you'll always have multiple paths forward and it'll be up to you to determine how to manipulate the planet's resources material and physical properties weather and creature behaviors in order to survive and thrive in this video we'll show one example of how you can leverage creature Behavior this biome is inhabited by long neck Sabers and the muskeg bear you need to expand your infrastructure with power but Sabers are aggravated by the ultrasonic frequencies emitted by your relays and will attack and Destroy them by scanning the habitats

muskeg bear you need to expand your infrastructure with power but Sabers are aggravated by the ultrasonic frequencies emitted by your relays and will attack and Destroy them by scanning the habitats you'll have learned that Sabres are afraid of predatory bears and that bears love muskegg fruit pull up your draft of a power relay that's been infused with the muskeg fruit place then materialize it without getting spotted now Bears will defend this area and Sabers will not attack your power relays your network is safe everything you do on this planet affects your ecological footprint in this example we've shown one way to solve a problem but there are many other ways to approach this challenge you'll quickly learn that this planet is watching you and has the power to react to your every move wish list the signal on Steam and join our Discord for updates and exclusive access to play tests where you can provide feedback that help shape the game [Music] the best all while the worst are
